person.persName: Delaney R. Carr (1st Kentucky Cavalry Regimen, attorney)

body.p: Lawyer and Jurist. Native of Clinton County, Kentucky. Enlisted July 27, 1861 in 1st Kentucky Cavalry Regiment. Promoted from Sergeant to 2nd Lieutenant, January 26, 1862; to 1st Lieutenant, August 18, 1862; to Captain, December 25, 1863. Served in the State Legislature as a representative from 1865 to 1867

bibl.p: Tarrant, Sergeant E., The Wild Riders of the First Kentucky Cavalry : a History of the Regiment, in the Great War of the Rebellion, 1861-1865 : Pathetic Scenes, Amusing Incidents, and Thrilling Episodes, a Regimental Roster, Prison Life, Adventures, and Escapes (New York: New York Public Library, 1894), 410; Jack Ferguson, Early Times in Clinton County (1986), 4.
